commands: This is not a complete list. Some commands may accept other verbs
'TAKE': Removes item from surroundings and deposits it in inventory
'USE': Activate object or use it to interact with another object
parser: This program uses a command parser based on Zork 1: http://people.cs.bris.ac.uk/~ecsnp/games/IEEE_zork.pdf
This means that a command is 'One line of text terminated by a carriage return (the enter key)'. Unlike Zork 1, however, all words are not distinguished by their first nine letters
A command only allows for one 'action' at a time. This means that while 'DROP KEY THEN GO NORTH' won't work, 'OPEN DOOR WITH KEY' will work
While this can allow for more complex commands, they probably won't be recognised by the command parser
